root.name: Casino Inc: The Management
root.description: Overview:Casino Inc: The Management is an Addon to Casino inc. Including a further 3 cities to explore and expand your casino empire to. The Addon focuses on the underworld aspects of gameplay, introducing the firebomb which you can attack other casinos and establishments with. Failure:The game was poorly received as the original game had only a small community of hardcore fans due to clumbsy game mechanics and an over-use of micro-management rendering the game a chore to play well. Hothouse Creations Ltd. stopping producing games a short time later.
